thread.title: Joint statement by Senators McCain and Graham on the president’s immigration decree
thread.title_full: Joint statement by Senators McCain and Graham on the president’s immigration decree

author: Dan Peterson
title: Joint statement by Senators McCain and Graham on the president’s immigration decree
text:
Senator Lindsey Graham (R-SC) 

I try, with considerable success, to avoid political discussions on the Sabbath, which is a day that I seek to devote to more important and more permanent things than politics. 

But this joint statement, issued by Senators John McCain (R-AZ) and Lindsey Graham (R-SC) represents important breaking news and, in my judgment, focuses on an issue that involves ethics as much as politics. Moreover, I concur with them:
